title: Living tomorrow. No. 136
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: The development of a combination microwave/convection oven; precision timber cutting with the aid of a computer; capping children’s molars with acrylic to prevent decay; intercontinental air shipping using the “flying fridge” insulated freight container.
